skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: second time music
des:
Second Time Music is a combination of Adult Contemporary music, Soft Rock and Easy Listening music. We have coined the phrase “Adult Contemporary Hits” to help identify this unique musical blend to our listeners and affiliates. 

You will find that ‘STM’ is an entertaining station that your will come to enjoy and look forward to each week. 

We encourage listeners to send us requests to our email request address (requests@secondtimemusic.com). While we can’t guarantee that we will be able to find every song requested we do maintain our own 3000+ title library and have access to over 5000 more titles from other music sources.

| Station/Stream Contact | https://www.secondtimemusic.com/ | Email: Requests@SecondTimeMusic.com 

DEVELOPER CONTACT | STEVE - 844.54.ALEXA (844.54.25392).

 The skill Developer, is not affiliated, or in any way responsible for the content (or music licensing) of the audio stream or any other content within this skill. The developer has no affiliation with the station or stream, and did not create the audio content
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
